#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
       long long  int n,a=1,b=1,c;
        cin>>n;
        if(n==1)
            cout<<"A"<<endl;
        else if(n==2)
            cout<<"AA"<<endl;
        else
        {
            cout<<"AA";
            for(int i=3;i<=n;i++)
        {
            c=a+b;
            a=b;
            b=c;

            cout<<(char)((c-1)%26+65);
        }
        cout<<endl;
        }

    }
}
